attributes.action: Ban Scottish Mp's from being able to vote on issues that affect England and Wales but not their Scottish constituants.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that it wrong that MP's from Scottish constituances can vote on matters that affect us in England & Wales but not in their scottish Constituances. I believe that they should not have a vote in the house of commons on any such matters.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
